text:
cted. In Crohns disease, inflammation can extend through the entire wall of the GI tract, leading to possible complications. Swelling can cause pain and can make the intestine empty frequently, resulting in diarrhea.
                
More information is provided in the NIDDK health topics:
                
- Crohns Disease  - What I need to know about Crohns Disease",NIDDK,Chronic Diarrhea in Children
